title.full: How Smart Are You IQ Test
title.reduced: How Smart Are You IQ Test

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. How smart are you? Take this IQ test and find out! Features include a detailed IQ breakdown, question generation that allows for retesting, and a full length 50 question test.
description.short: How smart are you? Take this IQ test and find out! Features include a detailed IQ breakdown, question generation that allows for retesting, and a full length 50 question test.
